ingredients: 500g mutton liver (cleaned and cut into pieces), 2 onions (finely chopped), 1 tomato (chopped), 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 green chili (slit), 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp coriander powder, 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add onions, and saut√© until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and green chili, and cook for a minute.
Add mutton liver pieces, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Stir well.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until the liver is fully cooked (about 10-12 minutes).
Sprinkle garam masala and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice or roti.
